title: FS: Ten Sovereign (mix of SGC, PSA and raw) - MOVED TO EBAY

posts.post_title: FS: Ten Sovereign (mix of SGC, PSA and raw) - MOVED TO EBAY
posts.post_content:
Prices include delivery.  Take all ten for $425.  Paypal preferred; scans here: [url]http://www.collectorfocus.com/collection/t206hound/sovereign[/url]

Bergen - S460 - PSA1 - $40
Devlin - S350 - PSA1 - $30   <- note that the grade is due to a tear at the bottom of the card
Dubuc - S350 - SGC40 - $75
Hofman - S350 - $30
Krause - S350 - $30
Kroh - S350 - $50
Mitchell - S350 - SGC30 - $50
Pfeister (Seated) - S350 - $50

J. Tannehill - S350 - SGC40 - $80
